devdoc.details: All function calls are currently implemented without side effects

RedeemToken(address,address,uint256,uint.details: This function call by any public user who transfer the token form the other network using bridge

addIRC20Token(address).details: This function calls onlyOwner to add the new token address in future

isOwner().details: Returns true if the caller is the current owner.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

removeIRC20Token(address).details: This function calls onlyOwner to remove the  token address in future

params._token: The addresss of  token to remove

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

transferToken(address,uint256,address,ui.details: This function call by any public user

devdoc.title: Network Bridge

RedeemToken(address,address,uint256,uint.notice: Redeem the  token from bridge to the other network

addIRC20Token(address).notice: Add the new token to bridge

transferToken(address,uint256,address,ui.notice: transfer the  token from bridge one network to the other network

userdoc.notice: You can use this contract for transfer token between two blockchain networks
